title: NEKOPALIVE
notes: Tried running with and without optirun, got the same performance of around 10 FPS, which is clearly unplayable. The dancing scene will also have an odd shade of yellow everywhere, and some artifacts on moving parts. No known workarounds.
Doesnt require VR, but VR was also tested and worked out of the box
title: NEKOPALIVE

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 530 (Skylake GT2) x86/MMX/SSE2
notes:
Only works properly with PROTON_USE_WINED3D=1 and PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 (use wined3d and disable esync). The former gets rid of odd yellow hue and the latter gets rid of lag.
It might have not been necessary, but I also added LC_ALL=ja_JP.UTF-8.
FPS appears to be capped at ~32 while they're dancing, but 60 in menu.
Steam overlay works, changing views with number keys also works.
Tested with and without optirun.
systemInfoNotes: GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M (396.54) using Bumblebee/optirun.
title: NEKOPALIVE
